snippet: President Obama made the comments to an Israeli television station less than a week before his first visit as president to that country.
abstract: Pres Obama tells Israeli television station that his administration believes it will take Iran over a year to develop a nuclear weapon and vows that United States will do whatever is necessary to prevent that from happening.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and DAVID E. SANGER

lead_paragraph: President Obama made the comments to an Israeli television station less than a week before his first visit as president to that country.

headline.seo: Iran Nuclear Weapon to Take Year or More, Obama Says
headline.main: Iran Nuclear Weapon to Take Year or More, Obama Says
headline.print_headline: Iran Nuclear Weapon to Take Year or More, Obama Says
